exam.examName: Joint Entrance Exam for Indian Institute of Technology
exam.description: IIT JEE is a national-level engineering entrance exam consisting of two stages – JEE Main & JEE Advanced. JEE Main is a screening exam to select the candidates eligible to appear for JEE Advanced, which will serve as the final exam to select candidates for admission into prestigious IITs. The IITs conduct a Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) to select candidates for the 4-year B.Tech and 5-year B.Arch courses every year.

exam.examName: Joint Entrance Exam for Indian Institute of Technology
exam.description: IIT JEE is a national-level engineering entrance exam consisting of two stages – JEE Main & JEE Advanced. JEE Main is a screening exam to select the candidates eligible to appear for JEE Advanced, which will serve as the final exam to select candidates for admission into prestigious IITs. The IITs conduct a Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) to select candidates for the 4-year B.Tech and 5-year B.Arch courses every year.
